participant_1.background:
I'm afraid of being judged for my diet.
my dad works in the automotive industry.
I need someone who shares my love of the outdoors.
i do not like wearing pants when i do not have to.
on weekends i like to go hiking.

participant_2.background:
I love to watch mystery movies when I'm not baking.
i like to plant flowers in my gardens.
My favorite type of food is locally sourced, organic food.
I prefer a nice glass of wine with my cheese platter.
i live in north dakota.

content.text: Hi! I'm interested in meeting people who love the outdoors as much as I do.
Hi! I love the outdoors too! I like to hike, camp, and explore new places.
That's awesome! I love to do all of those things too. I also love to garden.
That's great! I love to plant flowers and vegetables. I also like to cook with the food I grow.
That's so cool! I love to cook too. I'm a big fan of locally sourced, organic food.
Me too! I think it's so important to support local farmers and businesses.
I agree! I also like to go to farmers markets and support local farmers directly.
That's awesome! I love farmers markets too. I love to see all of the fresh produce and flowers.
Me too! I love being able to buy fresh, local food. It's so much better than the stuff you can get at the grocery store.
I agree! I think it's so much healthier and tastier.
Me too! I'm glad we have similar interests.
Me too! I think we'd make a great hiking and gardening buddy.
I think so too! We should definitely get together sometime.
Great! I'll send you a message and we can set up a time to meet.
Perfect! I look forward to it.
